articles.title: Why India's Response To US, Canada Probes Is Different - Envoy Explains - NDTV
articles.description: India's High Commissioner to Canada Sanjay Kumar Verma said Indian government is cooperating with American investigation into alleged thwarted assassination attempt and not Canada's probe into June killing of Khalistani terrorist Hardeep Singh Nijjar
